channel.title: Technical Blogs on Mosfish's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Technical Blogs on Mosfish's Blog

item.title: MITx MicroMasters in Statistics and Data Science
item.description:
Start my MicroMasters Program

I was recommended this program to enhance my DataScience basics by my friends. I wanna begin with MITx 6.86x Machine Learning with Python: from Linear Models to Deep Learning.

MITx 6.86x Machine Learning with Python: from Linear Models to Deep Learning.

item.title: 基于深度学习的医学预测系统
item.description:
怎么全是深度学习

想不到大四这门实习课还真有点东西，要么去企业干活，要么和其他人员做research，由于组里面朋友做过ai医学影像的工作，而我是属于什么都可以的，因此选择了医学预测系统，因为可以真真切切的见到患者的数据，弥足珍贵的体验。

论文基础学习

基于参考论文， 本周工作是阅读这几篇论文、选其中1~2个精读并复现论文，等待之后拿到数据与计算资源再说。

  1. Medical Image Computing and Computer Assisted Intervention – MICCAI 2023
  2. Multimodal Optimal Transport-based Co-Attention Transformer with Global Structure Consistency for Survival Prediction
  3. Clinical-BERT: Vision-Language Pre-training for Radiograph Diagnosis and Reports Generation
  4. MEDFuse: Multimodal EHR Data Fusion with Masked Lab-Test Modeling and Large Language Models
  5. MedFuse: Multi-modal fusion with clinical time-series data and chest X-ray images
  6. GLoRIA: A Multimodal Global-Local Representation Learning Framework for Label-efficient Medical Image Recognition
  7. VBridge: Connecting the Dots Between Features and Data to Explain Healthcare Models

Medical Image Computing and Computer Assisted Intervention – MICCAI 2023
